member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.GetBritishPersona(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Returns the BritishPersona for the ped.

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.GetVehicleRecords(Rage.Vehicle)
member.summary: Returns the VehicleRecords for the vehicle.

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.CreateNewCourtCase(British_Policing_Script.BritishPersona,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new court case to the court system.
member.param: String describing the crime committed, e.g. 'stealing a police vehicle'.
The decision the court will come to, e.g. 'Sentenced to 5 months in prison'

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.CreateNewCourtCase(British_Policing_Script.BritishPersona,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a new court case to the court system (not recommended in release builds. Use this overload only to set instant publish time for testing).
member.param: String describing the crime committed, e.g. 'stealing a police vehicle'.
The decision the court will come to, e.g. 'Sentenced to 5 months in prison'
The DateTime when the results will become available to the player.

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.DeterminePrisonSentence(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a court verdict for a prison sentence depending on the parameters.
member.param: Percentage based chance of the sentence being suspended. 100 = always suspended, 0 = never suspended.

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.DetermineFineSentence(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a court verdict for a fine depending on the parameters.

member.name: E:British_Policing_Script.API.Functions.PedOrderedOutOfVehicle
member.summary: Raised whenever the player orders a ped out of a vehicle on a traffic stop (also raised by LSPDFR+, rather use LSPDFR+'s event).

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.BritishPersona.#ctor(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Constructor that sets values based off the LSPDFR API

member.name: P:British_Policing_Script.VehicleRecords.Insured
member.summary: Automatically gets/sets insurance status using Traffic Policer.

member.name: P:British_Policing_Script.VehicleRecords.Stolen
member.summary: Uses the Rage.Vehicle.IsStolen property. If this is changed, the registered owner is altered appropriately.

member.name: M:British_Policing_Script.VehicleRecords.#ctor(Rage.Vehicle)
member.summary: Constructor that set values based off the LSPDFR API.
